comments: Boris, I'm guessing that (loosely speaking...;-) this is a view management issue because if the repro scenarios. If it turns out to be a problem in a more general area please re-direct.
Is it possible to reproduce this in the IDE? Nothing appeared in the log when I tried. (Using 3.2M6)
